title: A Fell Voice on the Air (3R52)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert Saruman to play an [Isengard] weather condition from your discard pile. Its twilight cost is -2.
Lore:	”'He's trying to bring down the mountain!'”
Rarity:	R
